channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dems See Hope in Polls to Defeat Sen. Collins in '26
item.description: Recent polling shows that Democrats have a chance to defeat Sen. Susan Collins when she faces reelection in 2026...

item.title: Indiana Lt Gov slams Democrats' 'DEI, radical revisionist history' on Three-Fifths Compromise
item.description: Indiana Lt. Gov. Micah Beckwith warned against Democrats' "revisionist history" on the Three-Fifths Compromise and defended a GOP anti-DEI bill.

item.title: Trump kicks off whirlwind week marking his 100th day back in the Oval Office
item.description: President Donald Trump's 14th week in office will also mark his 100th day back in the Oval Office, which he will celebrate in Michigan during a rally.

item.title: Rep. Byron Donalds: Work Begins to Cut '$1.5T in Spending'
